member.name: T:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleConversionUtils
member.summary: Handle type conversion and transformation utilities Provides safe type casting, Handleâ†’Entity resolution, and IL2CPP compatibility helpers DOC: F:\ModPeraspera\Internal_doc\ARCHITECTURE\Handle-System-Architecture.md

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleConversionUtils.ResolveHandle``1(System.Object,System.Func{``0,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Resolve Handle to strongly-typed entity with validation Safe alternative to direct KeeperMap.Find{T} with error handling Performance: O(1) with validation overhead
member.returns: Strongly-typed entity or null if conversion failed

member.summary: Resolve Handle to base object type (IHandleable) Use when exact entity type is unknown
member.returns: Base entity object or null

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleConversionUtils.ResolveHandles``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Resolve multiple Handles to entities efficiently Optimized for bulk operations with shared KeeperMap access Returns: Dictionary with Handle as key, Entity as value for successful resolutions only
member.typeparam: Expected entity type for all Handles
member.param: If false, stops on first error
member.returns: Dictionary mapping Handles to resolved entities

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleConversionUtils.HandlesToEntities``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object})
member.summary: Convert Handle collection to Entity collection Filters out invalid/non-convertible Handles automatically Performance: O(n) with validation per Handle
member.returns: Filtered collection of resolved entities

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleConversionUtils.ExtractHandle(System.Object)
member.summary: Extract Handle from entity object Searches for Handle property/field in entity Performance: O(1) reflection lookup (cached)
member.param: Entity object to extract Handle from
member.returns: Handle object or null if not found

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleConversionUtils.EntitiesToHandles(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object})
member.summary: Convert entity collection to Handle collection Extracts Handles from each entity and filters out nulls
member.returns: Collection of extracted Handles

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleConversionUtils.SafeCast``2(``0)
member.summary: Safe type cast with Handle validation Attempts to cast entity to target type with Handle integrity check
member.returns: Converted entity or null if cast failed

member.returns: Building entity or null if conversion/validation failed

member.returns: Conversion system diagnostics

member.name: T:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleHelper

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleHelper.IsAvailable
member.summary: Check if Handle system is available Returns true after BaseGame.Awake() and Keeper initialization

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleHelper.FindSafe``1(System.Object)
member.summary: Find entity by Handle with type safety and null protection Performance: O(1) Dictionary lookup via KeeperMap Thread Safety: Safe - Handle is value type, validation before access
member.param: Entity Handle (from game events, UI, etc.)
member.returns: Typed entity instance or null if not found/invalid

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleHelper.IsValid(System.Object)
member.summary: Validate Handle exists and is accessible Fast check before attempting FindSafe operations Performance: O(1) Dictionary.ContainsKey operation
member.returns: True if Handle is valid and entity exists

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleHelper.TryFind``1(System.Object,``0@)
member.summary: Attempt Handle resolution with try-pattern Combines validation and access in single call Recommended pattern for performance-critical code
member.returns: True if resolution successful

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleHelper.FindAll``1
member.summary: Get all entities of specified type from KeeperMap Efficient enumeration of all registered entities by type Performance: O(n) where n = total entities in KeeperMap
member.returns: All entities of type T currently in game

member.name: M:PerAspera.GameAPI.Wrappers.HandleHelper.FindMany``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object})
